response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am confident it could also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its significance and rarity, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is an exclusive chance to own something truly exceptional at a competitive price. Should you be interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 750000}
